name: Ratio Changer
description: This plugin can changes ratio of object(shapes and texts and paths).Just select objects and set the ratio you want to change. Various ratios(Square, Golden, Yamato, 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 16:10, Equilateral Triangle )and Custom ratio.
summary: This plugin can change the ratio of objects
author: Takayuki Iida
